name: Bali
description: Known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and lush green rice terraces. Bali offers a perfect mix of relaxation and adventure.

name: Paris
description: The City of Light, famous for its iconic landmarks, world-class museums, and exquisite cuisine. Paris is a destination for romance and culture.
bestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to October

name: Queenstown
description: Adventure capital of New Zealand, surrounded by majestic mountains and set on the shores of crystal clear Lake Wakatipu.
bestTimeToVisit: December to February (summer), June to September (skiing)

name: Chiang Mai
description: A city in mountainous northern Thailand known for its beautiful ancient temples, night markets, and proximity to jungle trekking areas.

name: Cape Town
description: A beautiful coastal city with stunning landscapes including Table Mountain, beaches, and nearby wine regions.
bestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

name: Cusco
description: Former capital of the Inca Empire, and gateway to Machu Picchu. Known for its archaeological remains and Spanish colonial architecture.

name: Kyoto
description: Japan's cultural capital, famous for its classical Buddhist temples, gardens, imperial palaces, and traditional wooden houses.

name: Vancouver
description: A bustling west coast seaport in British Columbia, surrounded by mountains, offering a blend of outdoor activities and urban amenities.

name: Santorini
description: Famous for its dramatic views, stunning sunsets, white-washed houses, and blue-domed churches against the backdrop of the Aegean Sea.
bestTimeToVisit: April to May, September to October

name: Serengeti National Park
description: One of the most famous wildlife conservation areas in the world, known for its annual migration of wildebeest and zebra.
